标签帮助您用彩色标记组织会话。使用它们按项目、主题或优先级对对话进行分类，方便以后筛选和查找相关会话。
Labels help you organize sessions with colored tags. Use them to categorize conversations by project, topic, or priority.

权限控制您的智能体拥有多大的自主权。在探索模式下，智能体只能读取和研究，非常适合在提交更改之前理解问题。
Permissions control how much autonomy your agent has. In Explore mode, the agent can only read and research — perfect for understanding a problem before committing to changes.
